education.studyType: Focused on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Git, React, Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL. Built full-stack projects and followed industry-standard development practices.
CS50 is Harvard’s Introduction to Computer Science course, focusing on problem-solving, algorithms, data structures, and foundational programming.

highlights: Implemented an AI-powered post generation feature, allowing users to generate context-aware posts with content filtering for appropriate language.
Successfully completed mentorship application and  structured mentorship program focused on core software development principles.

Trained 1-on-1 by an experienced mentor in full stack development and  developed skills in problem-solving, version control, and full stack development using tools like JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, Node.js, Express, and Prisma.
Managed multiple customers while maintaining a high standard of customer service, ensuring clear communication and accurate service.
Demonstrated flexibility by covering shifts in multiple departments, adapting to different roles and responsibilities as required.
Guided clients through form completion and documentation processes for new device requests, ensuring all submissions met compliance standards and processing timelines.
Maintained accurate logs of issued and returned devices to support inventory tracking and audit readiness, helping the team stay organized and prepared for reviews.
